summary: When a murder happens with a bloody inscription and a ring left behind, puzzled Scotland Yard detectives go to Sherlock Holmes for help.
cast: Vasiliy Livanov|Vitali Solomin|Rina Zelyonaya|Borislav Brondukov|Igor Dmitriev|Nikolay Karachentsov|Adolf Ilin|Viktor Aristov|Oleg Khromenkov|Lyubov Tishchenko|Vitali Baganov|Boris Livanov Jr.|Yakov Naishuler|Aleksey Shato-Ba|Igor Okrepilov|Mikhail Vorobyov|Igor Efimov
keywords: tv mini series|russia|foreign language adaptation|based on novel
title: Krovavaya nadpis
